short_description: Removes outlier values from a target column.
long_description: Removes numerical outlier valuesfrom a target column, The user specifies a method to define outlying values.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queenâ€™s IP saddress or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: InputTable
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the table containing the input data

argument_clauses.name: OutputTable
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the output table with outlier data removed or replaced

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the numeric column to be filtered for outliers.

argument_clauses.name: OutlierTable
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the outlier table with original outlier data

argument_clauses.name: GroupByColumns
argument_clauses.description: Specifies list of columns to group the data by The default value is groupdummy8675309.

argument_clauses.name: Method
argument_clauses.description: Specifies method of outlier identification The permitted input values are [PERCENTILE, TUKEY, CARLING, MADMEDIAN, MAD-MEDIAN]. The default value is PERCENTILE.

argument_clauses.name: PercentileThreshold
argument_clauses.description: Specifies percentile values used only for percentile filtering Each input value must be no less than 0.0 and no greater than 100.0.

argument_clauses.name: PercentAccuracy
argument_clauses.description: Specifies accuracy of percentiles for filtering The default value is 0.5.

argument_clauses.name: IQRMultiplier
argument_clauses.description: Specifies multiplier of interquartile range used n Tukey filtering The default value is 1.5.

argument_clauses.name: RemoveTail
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the side of the distribution to be filtered The permitted input values are [BOTH, UPPER, LOWER]. The default value is BOTH.

argument_clauses.name: ReplacementValue
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the values to replace outlier with or delete The default value is delete.

argument_clauses.name: ApproxPercentile
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the option to use approximate percentile filtering or not The default value is true.

argument_clauses.name: MadScaleConstant
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the MAD scale constant used in MAD-Median method The default value is 1.4826.

argument_clauses.name: MadThreshold
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the MAD Threshold used in MAD-Median filtering The default value is 3.0.
